name: OMSOFTWARE PVT LTD
tagline: Top Mobile and Web App Development Company
description:
OMSOFTWARE is an international complete software development company specializing in mobile and web application development.  Our strong foundation and extensive experience in mobile and web app development have established us as a leader in our field.
 Our award winning company has been providing trusted development services since 2004.  We have experience developing app solutions for a diverse range of clients across a wide variety of industries and sectors.  We are based in India with a strong presence in the UK, Europe, the USA and Singapore.  OMSOFTWARE is an offshore web development company, so no matter where you are in the world, we can assist you with your web-based software development needs.
At OMSOFTWARE, we think outside the box and pride ourselves on finding innovative solutions for our clients’ requirements.  We value creativity and our highly skilled team of developers, designers, technicians and support staff ensure that a superior service is delivered every time.  We prioritize getting to know our clients and their businesses in order to ensure that we meet their needs and create unique solutions to perfectly fit their requirements.
We understand that every business is different and so we tailor our solutions to suit your needs. 
Professionalism and commitment to high service standards have earned us a commendable reputation amongst our industry peers as well as clients.  Our extensive testimonials section supports our belief that we consistently provide service of the utmost quality.
We are able to perform under the toughest deadline without compromising on quality.  We place a strong focus on efficiency and are able to reliably produce quality web and mobile app solutions in record time.
